lead_paragraph: Mobile apps that allow users to create their own emojis or share the stylized images of NBA star Stephen Curry and other celebrities are paying off for a small upstate New York company.

headline.main: Smiley Faces at Small Company Making Popular Emoji Apps
headline.print_headline: Smiley Faces at Small Company Making Popular Emoji Apps
